title: Federal court rules WhatsApp and Facebook’s malware exploit case against NSO Group can proceed
text: A U.S. federal court judge ruled on Thursday that WhatsApp and parent company Facebook’s lawsuit against Israeli mobile surveillance software company NSO Group can go forward. title: Instagram is reportedly rolling out a TikTok copycat
text: Facebook’s Instagram app will reportedly launch a new service in the coming weeks that copies the wildly popular features of the controversial TikTok app. Instagram Reels — which, like TikTok, allows users to make 15-second video clips set to music — will make its global debut soon as TikTok faces growing scrutiny over its Chinese.

title: Europe’s Top Court Collapses The Privacy Shield In Facebook Data Transfer Case

title: Privacy activist Schrems welcomes EU court decision on Facebook
text: Austrian privacy activist Max Schrems on Thursday welcomed a decision by the European Union's top court in his case against Facebook , saying the legal basis for more then 5,000 U.S. companies that use an EU tool to transfer Europeans' personal data to the United States for commercial use has been annulled.
